property.name: _windowProperties
property.value: {bounds={0, 91, 1414, 798}, maximized=false}

property.name: text
property.value:
Transcribe speech. Stop after 30 seconds.
This demo illustrates the use of a custom dictionary and language model.
New dictionaries and language models can be generate from a file of sentences using the Sphinx lmtool: http://www.speech.cs.cmu.edu/tools/lmtool-new.html Download the generated .dic and .lm files.
This model is trained for weather sentences, try:
"Berkeley will be foggy tomorrow."
The output will appear on stdout.

property.name: text
property.value:
This model uses the Sphinx4 speech recognition library, which must be installed separately because of its size.
1. Create the directory where configure looks for the Sphinx4 jar files: mkdir $PTII/vendors/misc/sphinx4 2. Download these .jar files and place in ptolemy/vendors/misc/sphinx:
wget -O $PTII/vendors/misc/sphinx4/sphinx4-core-5prealpha.jar 'https://oss.sonatype.org/service/local/artifact/maven/redirect?r=releases&g=net.sf.phat&a=sphinx4-core&v=5prealpha&e=jar'
wget -O $PTII/vendors/misc/sphinx4/sphinx4-data-5prealpha.jar 'https://oss.sonatype.org/service/local/artifact/maven/redirect?r=releases&g=net.sf.phat&a=sphinx4-data&v=5prealpha&e=jar'
3. Run configure to update the classpath to include the jar files (cd $PTII; ./configure)

property.name: text
property.value: Author: Elizabeth Osyk

property.name: script
note
property.value: NOTE: To see the script, invoke Open Actor

property.name: description
property.value: Test accessor that spontaneously produces outputs once per time interval. This implementation produces a counting sequence.

property.name: author
property.value: Christopher Brooks and Edward A. Lee. Based on TestSpontaneous by Edward A. Lee

property.name: version
property.value: $$Id: TestSpontaneousOnce.js 1659 2017-05-09 14:26:57Z cxh $$

property.name: output (port)
property.value: The output port

property.name: delay (parameter)
property.value: The delay in milliseconds before the value is outputk.

property.name: value (parameter)
property.value: The value to be output after the delay.

property.name: description
property.value: Speech recognition accessor. This accessor opens an audio channel, listens for speech, then returns text.

property.name: author
property.value: Elizabeth Osyk

property.name: version
property.value: $$Id: SpeechRecognition.js 1981 2017-07-28 11:57:04Z cxh $$

property.name: start (port)
property.value: Start listening for speech.

property.name: stop (port)
property.value: Stop listening for speech.

property.name: text (port)
property.value: The text of any detected speech.
